titleInfo.title: File 4613/1919 Pt 2 'Mesopotamia:- Land Policy. Messrs Sassoon's dealings in land at Basra.'

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: part of folio 280 has been lost, resulting in the loss of some text.

mods.abstract: This item consists of part two of the subject file 4613/1919 Iraq: Land Tenure. It concerns British land policy in the occupied territories of Mesopotamia [Iraq] and particularly relates to the registration of land purchases.The correspondence is mainly concerned with a request from E D Sassoon and Company for its purchases of immovable properties in Basra to be registered by the British authorities. The principal correspondents are the following: the Officiating Civil Commissioner in Baghdad (Lieutenant-Colonel Arnold Talbot Wilson), the Deputy Secretary to the Government of India's Foreign and Political Department, and E D Sassoon and Company.
